quote_first: ... every clerk had his particular schedule of hours, which coincided with a single pair of tram runs coming from the city: A had to come in at 8, B at 8:04, C at
quote_last: and so on, and the same for quitting times, in such a manner that never would two colleagues have the opportunity to travel in the same tramcar.
title: The Periodic Table
author: Primo Levi
